page_content: The page is about a job opening for a traffic expert at the Strassenverkehrs- und Schifffahrtsamt in Schwanden.
The page provides weekly statistics on the COVID-19 situation in the Kanton Glarus, including quarantine and isolation data.
The page discusses the introduction of "eCode 178" for vehicle leasing and provides PDF forms for entry and deletion of the code.
The page discusses the importance of rapid information flow during catastrophes and provides a PDF guide on the Swiss alarm system.
The page discusses water protection in Kanton Glarus and provides multiple PDF guides on the subject.
The page discusses the proceedings of the Regierungsrat meeting held on November 30, 2010, including various topics like public transport and legal adjustments.
